SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_inquiry_board cib
AND (cib.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{criteria.keyword}, '%'))
AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_inquiry_comment cibc WHERE cib.id = cibc.C_Board_Id) = 0

SELECT cib.id, cib.Uid, cib.title, cib.regDate, cib.updateDate, COUNT(cibc.id) AS commentCount FROM customer_inquiry_board cib LEFT JOIN customer_inquiry_comment cibc ON cib.id = cibc.C_Board_id
AND cib.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{criteria.keyword}, '%')
GROUP BY cib.id, cib.Uid, cib.title, cib.regDate, cib.updateDate
HAVING commentCount < 1
ORDER BY cib.updateDate DESC, cib.regDate DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{criteria.amount}

SELECT cib.id, cib.Uid, cib.title, cib.content, cib.imgPath, cib.imgName, cib.regDate, cib.updateDate, COUNT(cibc.id) AS commentCount FROM customer_inquiry_board cib LEFT JOIN customer_inquiry_comment cibc ON cib.id = cibc.C_Board_id WHERE cib.id = #{id} GROUP BY cib.id
